## Plot output hook

This is a test of knitr plot output customization. 

```{r, cache=F}
library(knitr)

knit_hooks$get("plot")

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(alpha = .9)
```
